mapper.update: update ums_resource set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, `name`, url, description, category_id from ums_resource
